page.title: 04Town centre and Shopping
page.content: SPENNYMOOR HIGH STREET IS ONE OF THE COUNTY'S WIDEST.AN IMPRESSIVE TOWN HALL WITH ITS COUNCIL OFFICES DOMINATES THE TOWN CENTRE. CLOSE BY IS THE NEW TRAFFIC-FREE PARKWOOD PRECINCT SHOPPING CENTRE WITH AN INDOOR MARKET. THERE IS AN OPEN-MARKET ON SATURDAYS & CHEAPSIDE ALSO PROVIDES EASY SHOPPING & PARKING FACILITIES. WEDNESDAY IS EARLY CLOSING DAY FOR MANY SHOPS. EDUCATIONAL FACILITIES ARE GENERALLY ADEQUATE WITH AMPLE PLAYGROUPS & NURSERIES, SEVERAL PRIMARY SCHOOLS & TWO COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOLS. THERE IS A SPECIAL DAY SCHOOL AT WHITWORTH HOUSE. THE AREA HAS SEVERAL CHURCHES & CHAPELS, CATERING FOR A VARIETY OF BELIEFS, AND STRONG ECUMENICAL LINKS EXIST.THE REGISTRAR OF BIRTHS,DEATHS & MARRIAGES IS AT NEARBY BISHOP AUCKLAND BUT REGISTRATION CAN BE MADE EVERY TUESDAY MORNING AT THE TOWNHALL.
